
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18758628" title="发布于 2025-03-07 21:52">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">北京大学DeepSeek系列教程：《DeepSeek与AIGC应用》</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚分享一个由北京大学推出的DeepSeek系列学习教程《DeepSeek与AIGC应用》，该文档全面介绍了DeepSeek-R1模型的技术特性、应用场景及其在AIGC领域的重要地位，同时深入剖析了AIGC的技术原理、应用价值、挑战及未来趋势，为听众提供了科学选择和使用AIGC工具的指导。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250307214945241-1366943938.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<blockquote>
<p><span>公众号「<strong>追逐时光者</strong><span>」回复关键字领取下载链接：<strong>DeepSeek</strong></span></span></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250307215012483-360496590.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AIGC&amp;AI赋能</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247508803&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0f6b1f85a8c337d28ea837c50461f7f6&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>一个免费且强大的.NET AI智能体</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510865&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=e121e13c5c31bbc1f9e86a56b7974076&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>清华大学《AIGC发展研究报告3.0版》</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247500243&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=10875edcf49a681c45a64f1aab393f5d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>全面系统的AI学习路径，帮助普通人也能玩转AI</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247507304&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=3bf84be622317afa9aa6dd46939ff3af&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>利用腾讯元器，将公众号变身为强大的.NET AI智能体</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510356&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=893eac8b78700140b7480b3efa1614bf&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>8款支持 C# 语言的 AI 辅助编程神器，高效编程利器！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510962&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=4a64d8c069251c3052d4f5cf3e22cec8&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>分享 5 个在微信中使用 DeepSeek 的方法，建议收藏！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510880&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=50fa193ece9f8aaf5bf9e064dc152f7f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>DeepSeek 官方推出的提示词库，AI内容生成的精准导航仪！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510076&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=aeebf5e150abb989e1c273d5bf5e0f82&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>清华大学推出的 DeepSeek 从入门到精通（104页）免费教程！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510482&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=38779c751a3d66d40b9159b03af4ea40&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>清华大学推出第二讲 DeepSeek 如何赋能职场应用？从提示语技巧到多场景应用！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510542&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=8754a4343fe7ab4e50f683f7441f44e3&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>清华大学推出第三讲普通人如何抓住 DeepSeek 红利，普通人必备的免费AI手册！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510760&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=cea35f9b31c939b41697bf7756fca61d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>清华大学推出第四讲使用 DeepSeek + DeepResearch 让科研像聊天一样简单！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510781&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=eb8c391bb46de5a6f413478b747a8c21&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>清华大学推出第五讲《DeepSeek与AI幻觉》，避免你的AI一本正经地胡说八道！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510356&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=ac1c8629a560967670627c75693568b7&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>腾讯元宝接入 DeepSeek R1 模型，支持深度思考 + 联网搜索，好用不卡机！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510105&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=eb1cbbe9a4e0446a26d35111da93f6b8&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>告别 DeepSeek 系统繁忙，七个 DeepSeek 曲线救国平替入口，官网崩溃也能用！</span></a></li>
<li><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510902&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=7adc46327b8751110d3045006b683df2&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>我的公众号接入了DeepSeek-R1模型，成为了一个会深度思考的强大.NET AI智能体！</span></a></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>教程核心要点总结</span></h2>
